idea-plugin.name: Minecraft Development
idea-plugin.description:
Provides first-class support for every major Java Minecraft modding or plugin development platform, including:
  • Bukkit
  • Spigot
  • Paper
  • Sponge
  • Forge
  • NeoForge
  • Fabric
  • Architectury
  • Velocity
  • BungeeCord
Also includes additional features supporting MCP mappings and Mixins for mod development. This plugin also includes a text-based NBT editor.
idea-plugin.change-notes: Please report issues to the issue tracker!

localInspection.displayName: Entity class does not match this entity class
Bukkit @EventHandler in class not implementing Listener
Parameter's type is not assignable to its @Getter method return type
Invalid @Inject usage in Sponge plugin class
Invalid usage of @SideOnly in nested class declaration
Invalid usage of @SideOnly in field declaration
Invalid usage of @SideOnly in method declaration
Invalid usage of variable annotated with @SideOnly
Invalid usage of method annotated with @SideOnly
Invalid usage of new object annotated with @SideOnly
Invalid usage of local variable declaration annotated with @SideOnly
IMessage or IMessageHandler implementation without empty constructor
Invalid empty ItemStack comparison with ItemStack.EMPTY
Mixin is not written in Java
Mixin not in a mixin config
Name does not match the pattern for added mixin members
Soft-implemented method does not override a method in the target interfaces
@Inject before a superconstructor call is cancellable
CTOR_HEAD is not targeting a constructor
CTOR_HEAD with enforce=POST_INIT doesn't target a field
Unnecessary mutable reference to captured local
BungeeCord @EventHandler in class not implementing Listener

action.description: Configure automatic updates for the Minecraft Development plugin
Find classes which mix into this class
Add a @Shadow for the selected members
Add an @Overwrite for the selected methods
Add a soft implementation for the selected methods
Copy the reference to the element for use in an injector
Generate an accessor for the selected member
Find the associated SRG mapping for this element
Copy the reference to clipboard in Access Transformer format
Go to the relevant Access Transformer entry, if it exists
Copy the reference to the element for use in a javascript coremod
Lookup MCP mapping info on a SRG field or method
Converts any string literal into a Minecraft localization translation
Create skeleton classes used in Minecraft Mods
Copy the reference to clipboard in Access Widener format
